content: this crochet mushroom pincushion is a practical accessory for every craft enthusiast this adorable pincushion is not only a charming addition to your crafting space but also a useful tool to keep your pins and needles organized crafted with love and attention to detail this crochet mushroom pincushion pattern is perfect for absolute beginners size - approximately 7 5 cm/3 inches when using the suggested yarn size and hook **materials and tools ** * yarn - dk yarn in white and red * crochet hook - 2 75/3 00 mm * rice or sand * fiberfill * scissors * tapestry needle * stitch marker happy crocheting ©angevikacrochet - all rights reserved
